page.title: 17EVERYDAY LIFE OF AN ADULT.
page.content: {MR.D.SHORT of West Auckland,Tuesday {2nd.July,1985.}My first task is to get washed and shaved and clean my teeth. I then sit down with a cup of tea and read the'Northern Echo'(our local daily newspaper) until 8-15 a.m.At 8-50 I leave in the car,taking my wife Joan to work and daughter Alison to school on my way to work.At 9-00a.m. I arrive at South Durham Fibres where I am Technical Manager.We make synthetic fibres for the brush trade from poly- vinyl chloride,polyethylene,and styrene.My first duty is to check the previous 24 hours'production.This takes me to about 10-00a.m.when I log and correlate the results.I then have a quick cup of coffee.Today is quite busy,as I have 3 sales representatives coming to see me.As Technical Manager I am also involved with engineering and electrical problems.{SEE P.18.....
